resources.string: We believe every picture tells a story.Picshu brings life to your digital pictures by printing and doorstep delivery
Select as many as 100 pictures in a go from your collection
Edit your pictures and upload them in easy steps that\'s it! We\'ll print and mail your book
Cherish,share and display prints with fun new covers each time you print
Can select a maximum of %d images
App requires permission to Storage to view images.
App requires permission to Storage to view images. Tap Settings and go to Permissions to grant permission.
Get the full pic in frame for best prints

PICSHU is a company dedicated to customer need and want to build a network so that we can deliver you nothing less than the best experience.

 We are here to provide you with a collection of gifting solutions delivered to your doorstep with the minimal effort, inexpensive and maximum satisfaction.

 Our first line of product is the picture book. It is the easiest way to gift everyone to bring a smile on their face and relive all those moments that are captured with your mobile.

 Our android, iOS and website are so easy to use that you can print a phonebook in less than 5 steps.

 There are many awesome things that can be done with all the pictures that are printed, it all depends on your imagination.

 We need your support and love to inspire us so that we can serve you better.
-Select the menu from the main gallery screen and click on the picture to select the image
Crop the image using different tools:
to rotate the image to get right orientation.
to zoom in/out feature to get the maximum picture in the given frame.

- +/- can be used to select the number of copies to increase or decrease.

 - You can also alter no. of copies by clicking on the image and use the seek bar to change.

 - Select as many as 98 copies of the same image.

 - Deselect an image by changing the no. of copies to “0”.

-After “98” images are selected, click on Upload and review your order and click on upload.

-Size of the each picture will be 4”×6” inches.

 -Each book comes with 98 of your memorable pictures.

 -The book comes with spiral binding and perforation and also has the date of the picture being clicked.

-Once your pictures are uploaded, the next following day all the books are printed, cut, binded and are dispatched the same day itself.

 -Once dispatched it will be updated in the PICSHU app and a SMS notification will be sent

 -In less than 5 days you will get the picture book at your doorstep
Please update the app to use our new features
